sentence.Network_en: Another drawback is that nitrobenzene is both poisonous and explosive.
sentence.Network_cn: 硝基苯的另一个缺点是既有毒又易爆炸.

sentence.Network_en: In nitrobenzene production process , reboiler explosion accident often occurs in rectification system.
sentence.Network_cn: 笔者借助实验方法,对硝基苯精馏再沸器爆炸事故机理进行探讨.

sentence.Network_en: The production of aniline and nitrobenzene is quite hot in China.
sentence.Network_cn: 苯胺和硝基苯的生产在中国相当热火.
